response.job_title: Chemical Engineer from Universidad Nacional de Colombia and web development student at Platzi.
response.summary:
My name is Johnatan, and I'm a chemical engineer in a professional transition process to the technology sector. I have 6+ years experience in the plastics industry, highlighting my rol as R&D and production engineer at Ecobioplast, developing biodegradable thermoplastic starch formulations. 
However, I've always been passionate about technology and a couple years ago I made the decision to learn programing and web development, initially to complement my career but now I am determined to change my professional direction and take on new challenges, turning this into my professional activity.
During this time I've learned technologies like Javascript, React, Redux, among others. If you're interested, I invite you to check my GitHub profile (https://github.com/Yotis56) and my portfolio (https://yotis56.github.io/Portfolio/), or if you want to talk to me you can contact me via email: ingyotis@gmail.com
response.skills: Redux.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5, Desarrollo web, Desarrollo front end, React.js, Análisis de mercados, Control de calidad, Análisis financiero, Gestión de inventarios, Gestión de operaciones de producción
